thread.title: Disney Parks After Dark: Mickey and Minnie Prepare for Disneyland Paris 25th Anniversary Celebration
thread.title_full: Disney Parks After Dark: Mickey and Minnie Prepare for Disneyland Paris 25th Anniversary Celebration

author: Thomas Smith
title: Disney Parks After Dark: Mickey and Minnie Prepare for Disneyland Paris 25th Anniversary Celebration
text:
Next month, Disneyland Paris will kick off its 25th anniversary celebration with dazzling new entertainment, decorations, and – of course – costumes! Mickey and Minnie are already gearing up for their big debut, eagerly awaiting the arrival of guests to show off their new duds.
Expect to find two new daytime shows, a new parade and a new nighttime spectacular when the festivities premiere on March 26, plus the launch of two new Star Wars experiences. See you all real soon!
